meanings.definition: To attach or fasten with a screw.
meanings.sent1: He was screwing the shelf to the wall.
meanings.sent2: She is screwing the lightbulb into the socket.
meanings.sent3: The handyman was screwing the loose doorknob back in place.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic was screwing the bolts tightly to secure the engine.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter was screwing the hinges onto the door with precision.
